body_html:
Not sure how to fix it,

pytorch/aten/src/ATen/native/Embedding.cpp

Line 73 in 20b5e82

return sparse_type.sparse_coo_tensor(index, values);
raises

RuntimeError: Expected object of type Variable[torch.sparse.FloatTensor] but found type Variable[torch.LongTensor] for argument #0 'indices

I've tried to dig around, but I can't find out what goes wrong. Would be happy to learn, though.
cc @colesbury

body:
Not sure how to fix it, https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/20b5e82155ec052b2c168e3fb1aff0fd2dd3c8a4/aten/src/ATen/native/Embedding.cpp#L73 raises 
```python
RuntimeError: Expected object of type Variable[torch.sparse.FloatTensor] but found type Variable[torch.LongTensor] for argument #0 'indices
```
I've tried to dig around, but I can't find out what goes wrong. Would be happy to learn, though.
cc @colesbury
